tool_description: Transform your automotive applications with our powerful Car Data and Maker API. With access to 130,000+ car models, our API delivers all the necessary basic and technical information you need to power your applications. From HSN and TSN codes to performance specs and more, our API is regularly updated and improved every week to ensure your data is always up-to-date. Don't settle for less. Get started with our Car Data and Maker API today!
name: Car Models and Data
title: Car Models and Data

api_list.name: Get car by id
api_list.description:
Find a car by id. This route will show the complete car data. General data and also technical informations.

You can also select one of three languages. Currently supported languages are German (de)(default), English (en) and France (fr)

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description:
You can use one of three languages. 
German => de (default, fallback)
English => en
France => fr
The description of the technical details will be changed to the language

api_list.name: Find cars by hsn/tsn
api_list.description: Find a car by hsn and tsn. Only vehicles registered in Germany have an HSN/TSN at all.

api_list.name: Find Model Series Generation by name
api_list.description: Shows you all model series generation containing a certain text

api_list.name: Find Model Series by name
api_list.description: Show you all model series containing a certain string

api_list.name: Showing a list of cars
api_list.description: A list with all cars. These are provided per page. 20 cars are displayed on one page.

api_list.name: Show all brands
api_list.description: Shows a List of all car brands
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://car-models-and-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/brands"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "car-models-and-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://car-models-and-data.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/brands"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "car-models-and-data.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Find cars by maker, name or year
api_list.description: Find cars by maker, name or model year in a paginated list. The format for the date is month/year for example: 05/21 is mai 2021.

api_list.name: Show model series generations
api_list.description: Show a list of model series generations. Per page are 200 results listed. The generations also include the model series and brands.

api_list.name: Show car model series
api_list.description: A list of car model series

api_list.name: Find brand by name
api_list.description: Find the brand you need by the name
